title.rendered: Meet and Greet Parking at Birmingham

content.rendered:
If you find yourself travelling out of Birmingham airport, we recommend you choose Birmingham meet and greet parking to make life a little easier, and to avoid waiting for transfer buses and queues for parking spaces.  Meet and greet is fast, convenient and easy, especially if you are tight with time, have lots of bags, and or have family to take care of.

Your fully insured driver will meet you outside your departure terminal, conduct a quick check of your car, before making their way to the secure car park minutes away. This leaves you only yards to walk to the terminal building, and departure lounge.

Whilst your car is in our care, we promise to ensure it is always safe and secure, and with over 25 years experience, you can be safe in the knowledge that while you are travelling, your car is in safe hands. We are proud that your car will be parked in a Park Mark Awarded car park,  which will  have CCTV, flood lights and security fences around it.  You car will be driven by a uniformed, fully insured CRB checked driver.

The safety of your car is paramount to Maple Parking, and we have many precautions in place. Our car parks are Park Mark accredited and have CCTV, flood lights and security fences. All our drivers are fully insured to drive your car between the airport and the car park. To can read more about Car Safety here.

Meet and Greet Parking at Birmingham

 

  • Meet & Greet at Birmingham 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year
  • 24/7 Security at all car parks
  • All Maple Parking Staff are uniformed, fully insured and CRB checked.
  • Approved by Trading Standards, every approved operator is required to demonstrate that their parking facilities meet planning and security requirements

As well as safety, we are also passionate about giving you the best meet and greet experience with a smile, which is why we ask all of our customers to leave their feedback once they have travelled . This allows us to maintain our service and our staff, and often offers us areas which we can look at improving. Don’t just take our word for it, take a look at what our customers say, by reading our reviews.

Trustpilot
